text: Lisburn (; "Lisburn/Lios na gCearrbhach" . Placenames Database of Ireland. ) is a city in Northern Ireland. It is southwest of Belfast city centre, on the River Lagan, which seperates County Antrim and County Down. It had a population of 45,370 people in the 2011 Census. ==References== Category:Cities in Northern Ireland Category:County Down Category:Settlements in County Antrim
title: Lisburn
